summary: Successfully tested new PDF invoice export and Excel report export features. Both backend APIs and frontend UI integration working perfectly. All export functionality operational with correct file formats and naming conventions.

All main navigation pages (Products, Materials, Recipes, Production, Dealers, Orders, Invoices, Accounting, Reports, Settings)
